description: {"blocks":[{"key":"457mr","text":"eDNA assay to detect great crested newt Triturus cristatus","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":40,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"2hgaq","text":"Laboratory work space and equipment were sterilized by UV-light and DNase solution and 70% ethanol. Filter pipet tips were used in all steps of the laboratory work.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6pcgo","text":" Negative controls of DNase/RNase free water were used in each qPCR assay. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ee1l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hlkj","text":"DNA extraction was performed using Qiagen DNeasy power water sterivex kit. The quality of the extracted DNA was estimated using Nanodrop.  Qiagen DNeasy power water sterivex kit: https://www.qiagen.com/se/resources/resourcedetail?id=c5fe7d5f-070a-4ebe-ac04-4bbf05a13e91\u0026lang=en","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":179,"length":98}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"85043C3332A911EDB0470A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.qiagen.com/se/resources/resourcedetail?id=c5fe7d5f-070a-4ebe-ac04-4bbf05a13e91\u0026lang=en"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77onu","text":"Internal control ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qr7o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1f8a","text":"When performing DNA extraction, it is often advantageous to have an exogenous source of DNA template that is spiked into the lysis buffer. This control DNA is then co-purified with the sample DNA and can be detected as a positive control for the extraction process. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dplv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5r070","text":"http://www.primerdesign.co.uk/assets/files/internal_control_handbook_dna.pdf?timestamp=1469446474","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":97}],"data":{}},{"key":"ku52","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"A676705632A911EDB0470A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://www.primerdesign.co.uk/assets/files/internal_control_handbook_dna.pdf?timestamp=1469446474"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1bhis","text":"Internal PCR control. The Cq value obtained with the internal control will vary significantly depending on the extraction efficiency, the quantity of DNA added to the PCR reaction, and the individual machine settings. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3n45","text":"Cq values of 27±3 are within the normal range. title: qPCR assay for detecting Triturus cristatus

versions.title: qPCR assay for detecting Triturus cristatus

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"22pdb","text":"Handling high concentration of positive controls was performed in a post-PCR room which is physically separated from the pre-PCR room to avoid contamination. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbiri","text":"Always add your samples first and seal them before adding the serial dilutions of positive control (standard) at the end.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
